mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, D.* FROM (SELECT * FROM NOTICE WHERE TITLE LIKE #{word} ORDER BY REGDATE DESC) D) WHERE R >= #{start} AND R <= #{end} ORDER BY R ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE WHERE TITLE LIKE #{word}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE(NUM, NAME, TITLE, CONTENT, REGDATE) VALUES(NOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO NOTICEREPLY(REPLYNUM, EMPNO, NUM, REPLY, REGDATE) VALUES(NOTICEREPLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{empno}, #{num}, #{reply}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT N.REPLYNUM, N.NUM, N.EMPNO, N.REPLY, N.REGDATE, S.NAME FROM NOTICEREPLY N, SMEMBER S WHERE N.EMPNO=S.EMPNO AND N.NUM=#{num}
SELECT * FROM NOTICEREPLY WHERE NUM=#{num} AND REPLYNUM=#{replynum}
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICEREPLY SET REPLY=#{reply} WHERE NUM=#{num} AND REPLYNUM=#{replynum}
